definition: Zhuge Liang (181-234), military leader and prime minister of Shu Han 蜀漢|蜀汉 during the Three Kingdoms period/the main hero of the fictional Romance of Three Kingdoms 三國演義|三国演义, where he is portrayed as a sage and military genius/mastermind
a genius in retrospect (idiom); hindsight is 20-20
variant of 三個臭皮匠，賽過一個諸葛亮|三个臭皮匠，赛过一个诸葛亮[san1 ge4 chou4 pi2 jiang5 , sai4 guo4 yi1 ge4 Zhu1 ge3 Liang4]
pinyin: san1 ge4 chou4 pi2 jiang5 , sheng4 guo4 yi1 ge4 Zhu1 ge3 Liang4
containing_words.word: 三个臭皮匠，胜过一个诸葛亮

definition: lit. three ignorant cobblers add up to a genius (idiom); fig. collective wisdom
pinyin: san1 ge4 chou4 pi2 jiang5 , he2 cheng2 yi1 ge4 Zhu1 ge3 Liang4
containing_words.word: 三个臭皮匠，合成一个诸葛亮

definition: lit. three ignorant cobblers add up to a genius (idiom); fig. collective wisdom/wisdom of the masses exceeds that of any individual
pinyin: san1 ge4 chou4 pi2 jiang5 , sai4 guo4 yi1 ge4 Zhu1 ge3 Liang4
containing_words.word: 三个臭皮匠，赛过一个诸葛亮

definition: lit. three ignorant cobblers add up to a genius (idiom); fig. collective wisdom/wisdom of the masses exceeds that of any individual
pinyin: san1 ge4 chou4 pi2 jiang5 , sai4 guo4 Zhu1 ge3 Liang4
containing_words.word: 三个臭皮匠，赛过诸葛亮

definition: lit. three ignorant cobblers add up to a genius (idiom); fig. collective wisdom/wisdom of the masses exceeds that of any individual
pinyin: san1 ge4 chou4 pi2 jiang5 , ding3 ge4 Zhu1 ge3 Liang4
containing_words.word: 三个臭皮匠，顶个诸葛亮

sentences.english: Zhu Geliang chopped and cut, are wrong.
sentences.chinese: 诸葛亮斩与不斩，都是错。

sentences.english: Zhuge Liang speculated that the river would be covered by fog in three days, which saved himself later.
sentences.chinese: 诸葛亮推测三日后江面有雾，他的推测救了自己。

sentences.english: The song was of great importance and benefits to Zhuge Liang's aspiration and achievement in life.
sentences.chinese: 此事于诸葛亮一生之志节与事业，裨益实多。
三个臭皮匠顶个诸葛亮。

sentences.english: GuoLiang Zhou speculated that surface of river has fog and his speculation save himself.
sentences.chinese: 诸葛亮推测三日后江面有雾，他的推测救了自己。

sentences.english: This is why Zhu Geliang felt remorse for the rest of his…
sentences.chinese: 这也是诸葛亮抱恨终生的底蕴所在。

sentences.english: Orychophragmus violaceus is a very valuable seed source of wild oil crops.
sentences.chinese: 诸葛菜是一种十分珍贵的野生油料作物种源。

sentences.english: He thought he was a Zhu Geliang.
He had to make three visits before Zhuge Liang agreed to do so, impressed by his sincerity.
sentences.chinese: 诸葛亮见刘备十分诚恳，终于答应了他的请求。

sentences.english: It used to be that software testing was an afterthought.
sentences.chinese: 以前人们通常认为软件测试只是事后诸葛。

sentences.english: I found all these databases of this information, although this was after the fact.
sentences.chinese: 我发现了这些信息的数据库，尽管这有点事后诸葛亮。

sentences.english: Half a li from the hermitage they dismounted as a sign of respect. Approaching on foot, they met Zhuge Jun.
sentences.chinese: 离草庐半里之外，玄德便下马步行，正遇诸葛均。

sentences.english: Repeater crossbows is countered by the longbow.
sentences.chinese: 回应你所谓的用诸葛弩对抗长弓。
但是，当然啦，事后诸葛亮总是好当。

sentences.english: Three cobblers equal Zuge Liang, the mastermind.
sentences.chinese: 三个臭皮匠，顶个诸葛亮。

sentences.english: He is always wise after the event.

definition: courtesy name of Zhuge Liang 諸葛亮|诸葛亮[Zhu1 ge3 Liang4]
Minister of War (official title in pre-Han Chinese states)/two-character surname Sima
to smoke/to fumigate/to assail the nostrils/to perfume
fragrance/warm/to educate/variant of 熏[xun1]/to smoke/to fumigate
Zhou Yu or Chou Yü (175-210), famous general of the southern Wu kingdom and victor of the battle of Redcliff/in Romance of the Three Kingdoms, absolutely no match for Zhuge Liang
class or grade/generation/plaintiff and defendant (old)/government department (old)
